#summary KVS compile and install
#sidebar table_of_contents

= Compile and Install =

== Windows ==

 > cd kvs

 > nmake

 > nmake install

== Linux and Mac OS X ==

 % cd kvs

 % make

 % make install

= Uninstall =

== Windows ==

 > cd kvs

 > nmake uninstall

== Linux and Mac OS X ==

 % cd kvs

 % make uninstall
